                       int numberOfCopies,
                       java.lang.String bookShelf,

        Parameters:
        bIsbn - the isbn of the book
        numberOfCopies - the number of copies of the book
        bookShelf - the identifier of the shelf
        bookPrice - the price of the book
        Returns:

      • addBook

                       int numberOfCopies,
                       int bookShelfPosition,
                       double bookPrice)
        Name: addBook if the book does not already exist, it is added to the bookshelf indicated
        Parameters:
        bIsbn - the isbn of the book
        numberOfCopies - the number of copies of the book
        bookShelfPosition - the index of the shelf in shelves
        bookPrice - the price of the book
        Returns:
        true if the book was not added (already existed), false otherwise

                              model.Client currentClient)
        Name: orderClientsBooks orders the client's list of Books by their shelf and their isbn
        Parameters:

      • giveResult

        public java.lang.String giveResult(char typeOfSort)
                            throws exceptions.MyQueueException,
                                   exceptions.MyStackException
        Name: giveResult simulates the different sections of the bookstore and returns the information of the results of each section in a String
        Parameters:
        typeOfSort - the type of sort to be used to organize the clients' books
        Returns:
        a String containing the results of each section
        Throws:
        exceptions.MyQueueException - if an instance of MyQueue was empty during the procedure and an attempt was made to get elements from it
        exceptions.MyStackException - if an instance of MyStack was empty during the procedure and an attempt was made to get elements from it

      • simulateFirstSection

        public java.lang.String simulateFirstSection()
        Name: simulateFirstSection simulates the first section
        Returns:
        a String containing the clients and their lists of books, unorganized

      • simulateSecondSection

        public java.lang.String simulateSecondSection(char orderBy)
        Name: simulateSecondSection simulates the second section of the Bookstore
        Parameters:
        orderBy - the method to be used to sort the clients' list of books (B, H or M)
        Returns:
        a String containing the clients and their lists of books, organized

      • simulateThirdSection

        public java.lang.String simulateThirdSection()
        Name: simulateThirdSection simulates the third section
        Returns:
        a String containing what the clients have in their baskets

      • simulateFourthSection

        public void simulateFourthSection(java.util.ArrayList<model.Client> clientsDeparture)
                           throws exceptions.MyQueueException,
                                  exceptions.MyStackException
        Name: simulateFourthSection simulates the fourth section
        Parameters:
        clientsDeparture - an ArrayList of Client where the clients who are done will be stored
        Throws:
        exceptions.MyQueueException - if an instance of MyQueue was empty during the procedure and an attempt was made to get elements from it
        exceptions.MyStackException - if an instance of MyStack was empty during the procedure and an attempt was made to get elements from it
